scripts.build:win-dev: npm run build && set NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --respawn --transpileOnly ./src/main.ts
scripts.build:unix-test: npm run build && rm -rf ./dist/config.json && cp ./src/_environment/config.development.json ./dist/config.json && NODE_ENV=test node ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:unix-prod: npm run build && rm -rf ./dist/config.json && cp ./src/_environment/config.production.json ./dist/config.json && NODE_ENV=production node ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:win-test: npm run build && rd /s /q ./dist/config.*.json && copy ./src/config.development.json ./dist/ && set NODE_ENV=test node ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:win-prod: npm run build && rd /s /q ./dist/config.*.json && copy ./src/config.production.json ./dist/ && set NODE_ENV=production node ./dist/main.js
